name: Hysterectomy
title: Hysterectomy
description: This value set has been tested at one clinical pilot environment. Use with caution. (Reviewed for updates 4/2022)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Open and minimally invasive hysterectomy procedures),(Data Element Scope: ICD10-PCS codes that express resection or destruction of the uterus (i.e., a hysterectomy).),(Inclusion Criteria: Open surgery hysterectomies and minimally invasive hysterectomies (e.g., vaginal hysterectomy, laparoscopic hysterectomy, laparoscopic-assisted vaginal hysterectomy, and robot-assisted laparoscopic hysterectomy) that are prefaced by codes that denote resection (OUT) or destruction (OU5) of the uterus),(Exclusion Criteria: Uterine surgical procedures that do not necessarily result in an inability to become pregnant (e.g., removal of a uterine lesion). Surgical procedures on the cervix alone (i.e., a procedure that involves the cervix but not the uterus, such as a cone biopsy of the cervix). Procedures that represent resection of the uterine supporting structure and/or cervix. Procedures that represent excision of the uterus (OUB),  or resection of the uterine supporting structure (OUT4) and/or cervix (OUTC).)
